Title: Relates to adding additional qualifying offenses for which an individual may be held in custody pending trial
Summary: Relates to adding additional qualifying offenses for which an individual may be held in custody pending trial; adds overdriving, torturing and injuring animals, failure to provide proper sustenance to animals, aggravated cruelty to animals, and animal fighting.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to adding additional qualifying offenses for which an individual may be held in custody pending trial
